name: Deeper Reflection
description:
CONTROLS:

-A: Move left

-D: Move right

-SPACE:  Jump

El jugador, a la izquierda, tiene que bajar por las cuevas esquivando obstaculos, vigilando de no alejarse demasiado 

You are the character on the left, and have to go down on the caves, while trying not to walk away from your mate on the right.

We hope you enjoy Deeper Reflection
